sentences.sContent: Smaller cars use less gas, are more maneuverable, cause fewer deaths, use fewer resources.
sentences.sContent_eng: Smaller cars use less gas, are more maneuverable, cause fewer deaths, use fewer resources.
sentences.sCn: 小车更节约汽油，更容易操作，造成的死亡率更低，用更少的资源。

sentences.sContent: The boats are small and maneuverable, allowing fishing to take place in narrow areas where commercial vessels typically can’t go.
sentences.sContent_eng: The boats are small and maneuverable, allowing fishing to take place in narrow areas where commercial vessels typically can’t go.
sentences.sCn: 这种船很小，并且容易操作，打渔的时候可以到达商业船不能进入的狭窄区域。

synos.tran: 有机动性的；容易操作的；可调动的

trans.tranCn: 容易操作的, 有机动性的
